channel.title: 06Scape Dupe Tutorial
channel.description:
Apparently http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596331.0.html is not the place to post this but since this is a Runescape Cheating community and I have found a Runescape private server Cheat surly this does not break any of our forum rules and should be allowed to stay.
Step 1) you need to access the outstream of the client for you reflection junkies this would be Client.RD
Step 2) Send an item in your inventory to the duel stake interface you can find this packet on the moparisthebest wiki under the 317 protocol
Step 3) use the withdraw 5/10/x packet and withdraw the same item
Step 4) enjoy your new items beware you will lose the original so be sure to withdraw more than one.
Also if you are looking to be a little more cold hearted, send a chat packet with a Ascii character not found in the default charset, it will crash any client in the chat update area. Including your own if you do not remove the chat censor
Mods Admins if you care to lock this first make a post about what rule it breaks instead of deleting it like a scumbag thanks.

item.title: 06Scape Dupe Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:53, topic:478150”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=596348.msg4200016#msg4200016 date=1358048679]

I got a white phat perfect for this type of thing
[/quote]What a fuc king prick, I got banned for saying I had a white phat lololol.

Who picked you to be a mod lol? Serious question, answer it please.

I’m curious to see how this progresses.

Hes a good mod, this has nothing to do with him on moparscape…

Don’t define what you don’t know. If you can get a list of attributes agreed universally to define a good mod and he fits them then you may say that otherwise no you may not. Generally speaking a good member of staff is open to interpretation but when you compare people like him to other people with similar roles (not on this site, this has a 12 year old mentality staffing system) you would generally define him as bad.
First part of the above paragraph is fact; second part is opinion.[/quote]
Sorry sir I don’t know what I’m saying
Yes I meant in my opinion sorry I didn’t make that clear sir it wont happen again

Read full topic

iCreatedHorror:

I agree with everything you said - the staff here get away with far to much. For example, the elve age edited a thread yesterday to something inappropriate, and when I brought it to Taharok, all he said is thanks, let me know if you see it again. The staff never get in trouble around here, they get to do what they want, and it’ll never change.
